id.title: ID
id.description: The ID number of the system

purposes.title: Purpose(s)
purposes.description: The purpose of the system as designated according to the DTPR standard

description.title: Description
description.description: What the system does and is intended for

accountable_entity_s.title: Accountable Entity(s)
accountable_entity_s.description: Which city department is primarily responsible for this system

data_type.title: Data Type
data_type.description: What types of information do this system collect

entity_s_with_access.title: Entity(s) with Access
entity_s_with_access.description: Which entities are able to access the data this system collects

data_access_protocols.title: Data Access Protocol(s)
data_access_protocols.description: What restrictions are there on accessing this system's data

data_processes.title: Data Process(es)
data_processes.description: What does this system do to the data it collects

data_storage.title: Data Storage
data_storage.description: How long does this system store the data it collects

instances.title: Instances
instances.description: What individual sensors do this system use

online_link.title: Online Link
online_link.description: If available, a link either directly to the data this system collects or a page with more specific information
